greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Analog of A084848, replacing "quadratic residue" (X^2) with "value of X^2+X".
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..116
Andreas Enge, William Hart, Fredrik Johansson, Short addition sequences for theta functions, arXiv:1608.06810 [math.NT], 2016-2018. See Table 5.
mathematica: a290731[n_] := Product[{p, e} = pe; If[p==2, 2^(e-1), 1 + Quotient[p^(e+1), (2p + 2)]], {pe, FactorInteger[n]}];
Reap[For[r = 2; k = 1, k <= 200000, k++, v = a290731[k]; t = v/k; If[t < r, r = t; Sow[v]]]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 13 2018, from PARI *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 10 2017
ext: Initial term added by _Hugo Pfoertner_, Aug 23 2018
